executiveSummary: Entrepreneurs Ramone Vanir and Kevin O’Pur pitched Genius Litter, a health-indicating cat litter that changes color based on a cat’s urine pH, seeking $250,000 for 4% equity. After competitive negotiations, they secured a deal with three sharks—Lori Greiner, Mark Cuban, and Kevin O’Leary—for $250,000 in exchange for 10% equity plus 2% advisory shares.
keyDecisions: Deal finalized with Lori Greiner, Mark Cuban, and Kevin O’Leary for $250,000 for 10% equity plus 2% advisory shares.

actionItems.task: Work with Lori, Mark, and Kevin to scale Genius Litter brand and expand distribution across online and retail channels.
Develop and launch two upcoming products: a health-indicating litter topper and a health-indicating dog pee pad.

nextSteps: The founders will collaborate with their three new investor partners to enhance marketing, grow direct-to-consumer channels, and prepare for new product launches to increase market reach and company valuation.
